post:
Nanobit.pro is a provider of OpenVZ and KVM VPS. We provide stable, reliable, and affordable services. And we launched about a  year ago on June 25th, 2014. As it's our birthday we have made a decision to cut all out prices in half, and the lovely people of LowEndTalk will be the first that have the chance to use these. Our servers are great for people who are looking for learning the basics of Linux CLI, hosting their own blogs or websites and even for game-servers. Our knowledgable and kind support team will be there to guide you every step of the way and provide you with assistance to insure that your services are running smoothly, all of the time.

We currently provide services in Germany, France and Canada!


**OVZ Tiny**  
1 GB of RAM  
2 Cores (i7 4470)  
50 GB HDD RAID 1 Storage  
500GB of Bandwidth  
$3 a month - [DE]/[CA]  
Link: https://ssl.nanobit.pro/cart.php?a=add&pid=1    


**OVZ Small**  
2 GB of RAM  
3 Cores (i7 4470)  
100 GB HDD RAID 1 Storage  
1TB of Bandwidth  
$4.50 a month - [DE]/[CA]  
Link: https://ssl.nanobit.pro/cart.php?a=add&pid=3    

**KVM Tiny**  
512 MB of RAM  
1 Cores (i7 4470)  
20 GB HDD RAID 1 Storage  
1TB of Bandwidth  
$4.50 a month - [FR]  
Link: https://ssl.nanobit.pro/cart.php?a=add&pid=19    


We hope to have you as our customer!    


Regards,  
The Nanobit.pro Team
